title: Prosegur SMART
summary: Your home and business Alarm System, always with you.
description: Your home and business Alarm System, always with you.With Prosegur Smart you can watch HD images from video detectors and Cloud video cameras from your Prosegur Alarm System from anywhere. The most advanced app for your Security System allows you to:·         Watch HD images from your home or business·         Arm, disarm, and partially arm your Alarm System·         Access Alarm System log entries·         Check Alarm System status·         Watch live video from the Cloud·         Search recordings from Cloud video archive·         Browse log for important events on your Security System·         Open Customer Service tickets
descriptionHTML:
Your home and business Alarm System, always with you.
With Prosegur Smart you can watch HD images from video detectors and Cloud video cameras from your Prosegur Alarm System from anywhere.

The most advanced app for your Security System allows you to:
· Watch HD images from your home or business
· Arm, disarm, and partially arm your Alarm System
· Access Alarm System log entries
· Check Alarm System status
· Watch live video from the Cloud
· Search recordings from Cloud video archive
· Browse log for important events on your Security System
· Open Customer Service tickets
comments: Doesn't update, often system is armed/unarmed and says the opposite. Takes forever to change status via the app.
Excellent and easy to navigate around the application
Not fast enough, can be difficult to use
No suena en el mobil cuando pongo la alarma
The interface could be more friendly and is very slow
